Followed Definitive Surgery . - Maintenance phase : nivolumab 3 mg/kg IV infusion every 3 week one year study treatment initiation . - Ipilimumab + nivolumab ( Arm B ) - Induction phase : Ipilimumab 3 mg/kg IV + Nivolumab 1 mg/kg IV every 3 week x2 . Followed Definitive Surgery . - Maintenance phase : nivolumab 3 mg/kg IV infusion every 2 week one year study treatment initiation . Definitive Surgery consist complete lymph node dissection/ lymphatic , cutaneous , subcutaneous distant disease resection ( week 6-8+ ) .
